description: Enterprise reporting table for contact specific education history items in Patient Education (PED) records.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Count for contact specific history detail.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: Date of contact for contact specific history detail.

columns.name: CONTACT_HX_KEY
columns.description: The education key for the contact-specific history record. The education key is a string in the form of Title^Topic^Point.

columns.name: CONTCT_HX_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the education topic record which is used to retrieve the contact-specific history for the education point in this record. If the education point is directly beneath the title then this value is null.

columns.name: CONTCT_HX_POINT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the education point for which the status was changed. The rest of the columns in each record contain the information related to this status change.

columns.name: CONTACT_HX_STATUS_NAME
columns.description:
This category value is the status of the education point. The possible status entries are as follows: 1. Active 2. N/A 3. Done 4. Deleted  This column is a foreign key reference to ZC_PED_CT_STATUS__PED_CT_STATUS_C.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


N/A


Done


Deleted


Not Started


In Progress

columns.name: CONTACT_HX_EDIT_IN
columns.description: The date and time the education point was documented on.

columns.name: CONTACT_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who performed the documentation associated with each record in the contact-specific history.

columns.name: CONT_HX_TITLE_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of the contact where the patient education history title was documented.

columns.name: CONT_HX_TOPIC_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of the contact where the patient education history topic was documented.

columns.name: CONT_HX_POINT_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of the contact where the patient education history point was documented.
